attributes.title: This app is horrendous.
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download. Not only that it caused my phone to glitch, I had to take my phone to the Apple shop to get it fixed. This app also sent me notifications even after I turned them off. Not to mention this app was highly inappropriate. I’m very disappointed in this app.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible, took forever to download, it also was glitching horribly when it finished downloading like it would take me out of the app etc maybe because I’m Asian who knows. Either way horrible app -10/10 like that’s how bad it is. I didn’t even let it finished downloading that’s how bad it is. Emphasize the bad guys.

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: This app is not a great effect towards the community. it does not benefit anyone in anyone what so ever. The owner of the app and face of it is a racist and sexually assaults innocent citizens. I know it’s not just me that has a problem with this. Our community would like this app to be rethought of and taken down. This should never be a app with the face of this rude and ignorant and selfish person.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible as soon as I downloaded the app my phone got hot and it has never done that before and It started to glitch I feel as if the government is stalking my phone now that I got this app even though they already do but I feel they got the big dogs now and long story short this app is horrible

attributes.title: leave bye-
attributes.review: Ok why did this take so long to download I even ate my McDonald’s I do not appreciate this😡😡😡.It kept glitching and making my phone BAMBOOZ WITH a patty fatty orange that did not pass the vibe check😢😡🔪.Im very sad now I’ll have to get my phone fixed💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔.Please make this app leave I do not recommend!GUYS IT WILL MESS UP UR PHONE LIKE IT DID TO MINE!!!!!!!!!😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭This just made me have no storage what a shame 😤

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app, should I even call it that. Whatever this thing is that they decided to put in the App Store, is the worst app I have ever seen. I took forever to download. The format is too prehistoric for my advanced mind to comprehend. It’s like a 500 year old got on the internet for the first time and decided to create an app. I did not have a good time. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. NOT WORTH IT.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I thought it would be good  especially since it’s the president’s app until I finally opened it and then my phone started to glitch terribly and photos of this orange person kept glitching on and off on my screen it was terrifying so I finally came to the conclusion to delete the app.

attributes.title: Utterly disappointed
attributes.review: I cant believe actually thought I was going to be able to worship my orange President wit this app 🥺 but it bit me I can’t  do this  my phone can’t take it any more it bIT ME nope what if it tries to send me to another country nope I can’t have that and also it glitches I tried putting it on rice 🍚 but nope if I could give it 0 stars

attributes.title: what is this HUNNY
attributes.review: I first downloaded this app in order to see that what’s the big fuss is about the orange cheeto balloon 🎈 man. Only to walk in and see A WHITE REFRIGERATOR HUNNY oh no... I was in SHOCK hunny I was in TEARS almost this app was VERY scary and made every living thing around me scared that my squirrels ran away👁👄👁. I was very distressed and sad when I realized that my squirrels 🐿 ran away. I DO NOT recommend this app if you like squirrels 😪😡🙈😭😭

attributes.title: Would not recommend
attributes.review: Upon using the app I noticed changes in my mood and behavior, I would unconsciously buy polo shirts and cargo shorts. My closed was soon filled with just socks and sandals and my concept of time vanished. I decided to delete the app when urges to call the police on families in public spaces started. Guess you could say this app is just a bad apple 👎
